record.creatorPhotographer: Payne, Elwood; Paralta Studios, Austin, Texas
record.description: Above the audience, astronomer Otto Struve (right) stands at the speakers' platform next to Charles J. Stilwell (left), vice-president of the Warner and Swasey Company, which built the observatory and telescope. Part of the telescope apparatus is visible.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteCopyright: Please credit this photo to Elwood M. Payne-Austin, Texas. Additional copies may be obtained from Paralta Studios of Austin, Texas
